title: The EU has negotiated in bad faith all along
text:
It is beyond obvious now that the only way for the UK to strike a deal is from the outside

We are entering the end game of the Brexit talks, the final realisation that the EU has been negotiating in bad faith right from the very start. It is clearer than ever that Brussels’s objective all along has been to keep the UK bootstrapped to the EU. They will only have themselves to blame if the result now is that we leave without a deal.

Who can forget Theresa May’s deplorable withdrawal agreement, among whose many sins the worst was the Irish backstop? It was a trap made possible by Dublin’s demand that there be no hard border on the island of Ireland: the EU have long believed that this was the...
description: It is beyond obvious now that the only way for the UK to strike a deal is from the outside
